citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Several of the capuchin enclosures have shift tunnels that have an accumulation of grime and debris that need to be
cleaned. In addition, several of the wires mesh has excess grime that needs to be cleaned. Indoor primary enclosures
must be sanitized at least once every two weeks or more often if necessary to reduce this level of grime in the tunnels and
on some of the capuchin wires and perching.
Correct by: March 14, 2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Housekeeping around the facility needs to be addressed. There are excess items in the upper room (cleaning containers,
gloves, tools, rick crackers etc.) that need to be stored in a manner that promotes good housekeeping practices.
In addition, the area around the food supplies in the kitchen needs to be cleaned. There are broken ice cream cones and
excess food debris on the floor along with empty gallon containers and chemicals. Items that are deemed trash should be
placed in the appropriate container and the area kept clean to facilitate housekeeping practices around food preparation
areas.
All areas of the facility need to be kept clean to facilitate good housekeeping practices to facilitate husbandry practices.
Correct by: March 8, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
